message.content: {"id": "19933", "title": "Emacs: Keybinding service always clears status line", "description": "When running in Emacs keybindings mode, any action that writes to the status line will have the status line message cleared by the AcceleratorScope.resetMode function. However, the actions could have written to the status line. Currently, we do not have the necessary API to retrieve the message in the status line, making it impossible to solve the problem in general. However, the problem can be solved for some cases by not clearing the status line when running in the default mode.", "OB": "Build 20020611", "EB": "", "SR": "1. Modify AcceleratorScope.resetMode function to not clear the status line when running in the default mode.\n\n2. Develop an API to retrieve the message in the status line, allowing for a more general solution to the problem."}

origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '19933', 'title': 'Bug 19933Emacs: keybinding service always clears status line', 'description': 'Bug 19933Emacs: keybinding service always clears status line However, the action could havewritten to the status line.We currently do not have the API necessary to get the message in the statusline, so it is not possible to solve the problem in general. The problem can besolved for some cases by not clearing the status line when running in thedefault mode. ', 'OB': 'Build 20020611When running in with Emacs keybindings, any action that writes to the statusline will have the status line message cleared by AcceleratorScope.resetMode.When a mode is entered, the keysequence that started the mode is written to thestatus line. ', 'EB': '', 'SR': ''}
